channel.title: Richard Stermer on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Richard Stermer on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Film Academy’s Longtime Theater Manager Richard Stermer Is Retiring (Exclusive)
item.description: Stermer, who first came to the Academy 31 years ago, has long presided over member screenings, Oscar nominations announcements and other activities at the organization’s Samuel Goldwyn Theater.
